about.paragraph: Software Developer with 4 years of experience. Knowledge in Java, Python, TypeScript, .NET, C, C++, Rust, Angular, React and Ionic; databases PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis and Firebase; methodologies SCRUM and Kanban; and others: AI, payment gateways (PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay), automated testing with Playwright and Cypress, CI/CD and Webhooks.

items.description: Improved security with JWT Sliding Sessions, led Angular/.NET migrations, and implemented multi-tenant CI/CD for faster deployments.
achievements: Improved application security with JWT Sliding Sessions, preventing unexpected logouts and enabling remote session revocation from the database.
Led the migration from Angular 2 to Angular 18 and from .NET 4.8 to .NET 9, improving the developer experience and delivery times.
Implemented CI/CD processes in a multi-tenant architecture, ensuring safe migrations, automatic rollbacks and reducing deployment time by 90%.

items.description: Integrated payment gateways, optimized checkout, and strengthened security and automated QA.
achievements: Implemented payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Square, Apple Pay and Google Pay), including credit/debit cards and coupon systems, increasing authorization rate by 11% and reducing checkout abandonment by 18%.
Orchestrated idempotent payment flows and retries (secure webhooks, fraud validation and method normalization), reducing reconciliation incidents by 35%.
Designed a suite of 350+ test cases (unit, integration, E2E, load and security: SQL/XSS) executed via CI/CD in GitLab, reducing critical post-deploy bugs by 40%.
Optimized tax, discount and gift card endpoints using rule-layer caching, reducing p95 latency from 420ms to 230ms.
Ensured best practices compliance (input sanitization, rate limiting and hardened JWT), mitigating automated malicious attempts by 70%.

items.description: Built critical POS modules, integrated EMV, optimized APIs, and strengthened security and CI/CD.
achievements: Built and evolved critical modules (transactions, reconciliation and tokenization) in Angular web platforms and Java/Spring backend, integrated with multi-country POS terminals.
Integrated firmware and logic in C for EMV validation and PIN pad flows, reducing field transaction failures by 22% (based on p95 retries).
Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines (build, tests, static analysis and deployment), shortening change lead time from 3 days to just 4 hours.
Optimized APIs with batching, pooling and selective caching, reducing p95 latency by 38% and JVM memory usage by 25%.
Implemented security controls (rotating JWT, mocks, rate limiting and hash signing), raising internal standards compliance (PCI-DSS-like) to 95%.

contact.title: Get in touch with me
contact.intro: Do you have a project, an idea, or just want to say hello? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
